DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine influence premedication drug Atropin , Fentanyl Mivacurium endotracheal intubation cerebral oxygenation cardiac output term preterm newborn infant . Two different protocol premedication compare .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Premedication Protocols Neonatal Endotracheal Intubation Cerebral Oxygenation
DOC.detailed_description: Influence follow procedure examine : - Application Atropin - Application Fentanyl - Application Mivacurium - possible desaturation / bradycardia intubation attempt - restoration arterial oxygen saturation / heart rate succesful intubation We aim examine change follow parameter use electrical cardiometry : - stroke volume - cardiac output We compare two different premedication protocol evaluate impact protocol time need intubation intubation difficulty .
DOC.criteria: newborn infant 44 week postmenstrual age indication elective semielective endotracheal Intubation parental inform consent emergency intubation
